entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C

Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 91 %

Dewpoint: -4.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
